resources.name: Mission United Central Florida
resources.description: Mission United Central Florida connects veterans and military families to essential resources including employment services, housing assistance, financial stability programs, and healthcare navigation. The program provides personalized support to help veterans achieve self-sufficiency.
resources.eligibility: Veterans, active-duty service members, National Guard, Reservists, and their families in Orange, Osceola, and Seminole counties.
resources.how_to_apply: Call 407-835-0900 or dial 211 to connect with Mission United services.
